scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One typed essay titled "Who Has These Records?" concerning early Brooklyn, N.Y. town records that have been missing since the Revolutionary War. The essay was meant to be included in newspapers in London, England for the Brooklyn Commissioners of Records, but was never printed. The essay is dated circa 1917, and its author is unknown.
